member.name: D3D10_TEXTURE2D_DESC.Width
member.summary: Texture width (in texels). The range is from 1 to D3D10_REQ_TEXTURE2D_U_OR_V_DIMENSION (8192). For a texture cube-map, the range is from 1 to D3D10_REQ_TEXTURECUBE_DIMENSION (8192). For more information about restrictions, see Remarks.

member.name: D3D10_TEXTURE2D_DESC.Height
member.summary: Texture height (in texels). The range is from 1 to D3D10_REQ_TEXTURE2D_U_OR_V_DIMENSION (8192). For a texture cube-map, the range is from 1 to D3D10_REQ_TEXTURECUBE_DIMENSION (8192). For more information about restrictions, see Remarks.

member.name: D3D10_TEXTURE2D_DESC.MipLevels
member.summary: Number of subtextures (also called mipmap levels). Use 1 for a multisampled texture; or 0 to generate a full set of subtextures.

member.name: D3D10_TEXTURE2D_DESC.ArraySize
member.summary: Number of textures in the texture array. The range is from 1 to D3D10_REQ_TEXTURE2D_ARRAY_AXIS_DIMENSION (512). For a texture cube-map, this value is a multiple of 6 (that is, 6 * the value in the NumCubes member of ), and the range is from 6 to D3D10_REQ_TEXTURECUBE_DIMENSION.

member.name: D3D10_TEXTURE2D_DESC.SampleDesc
member.summary: Structure that specifies multisampling parameters for the texture. See .

member.name: D3D10_TEXTURE2D_DESC.Usage
member.summary: Value that identifies how the texture is to be read from and written to. The most common value is D3D10_USAGE-DEFAULT; see for all possible values.

member.name: D3D10_TEXTURE2D_DESC.BindFlags
member.summary: Flags (see ) for binding to pipeline stages. The flags can be combined by a logical OR.

member.name: D3D10_TEXTURE2D_DESC.CPUAccessFlags
member.summary: Flags (see ) to specify the types of CPU access allowed. Use 0 if CPU access is not required. These flags can be combined with a logical OR.

member.name: D3D10_TEXTURE2D_DESC.MiscFlags
member.summary: Flags (see ) that identify other, less common resource options. Use 0 if none of these flags apply. These flags can be combined with a logical OR. For a texture cube-map, set the flag. Cube-map arrays (that is, ArraySize > 6) require feature level .
